scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two figures within an architectural setting. On the left, a woman with a halo is seated, wearing a patterned robe. To her right stands another figure, also with a halo, holding an open book. The background features a red drapery with gold ornamentation and architectural elements that suggest an interior space, possibly a room or a niche. The overall impression is one of a devotional or religious scene.
